StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_MUDAc.vateZip]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ZipCode varchar(9), @UserLogin varchar(15)
AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE MUD_FILE SET STATUS_ID = 'A', USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GetDate() WHERE ZIP = @ZipCode
IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM MUD_REACTIVATE_ZIPCODES WHERE ZIP = @ZipCode) BEGIN UPDATE MUD_REACTIVATE_ZIPCODES SET NOTIFY_FLAG = 1 WHERE ZIP = @ZipCode END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
